param.name: file
param.label: File Location
param.description: Location of File, examples: images/stories/powered_by.png images/flash/clock.swf

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: Width of the (image/flash) (in pixles), leave empty to use original file width

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description: Height of the (image/flash) (in pixles), leave empty to use original file height

param.name: alt
param.label: Alternate Text
param.description: Text to display when mouseover the image, leave empty to disable

param.name: link
param.label: Link
param.description: Link the image to a webpage, for example: http://google.com or an internal link, for example: administrator/ or leave empty for no linking

param.name: page
param.label: Link Type
param.description: when you click the image, it opens the link in either a new window or in the same window
